title: When the Star Witness Confesses to Lying
itunes:title: When the Star Witness Confesses to Lying
description:
Patricia Hurtado, Bloomberg Legal Reporter, discusses the raft of lies told by Tim Leissner, the star witness in the U.S. government’s case against Roger Ng, his former subordinate and the only Goldman Sachs employee to be brought to trial over billions of dollars that were looted from 1MDB. 

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
